pageTitleSingle: How much money do you have?
pageTitleJoint: How much money do you and your partner have?
moneyInAccounts: money in current, savings or deposit accounts with a bank, building society, credit union or the Post Office
ns&iBonds: National Savings and Investment products like Savings Certificates, Premium Bonds, Income Bonds and residual accounts
investments: investments like ISAs, PEPs and TOISAs
moneyOverseas: any other money in this country or overseas

moneyBackdated.label: How much money did you have on ${dateOfClaim}?
moneyBackdated.required: Enter how much money you had on ${dateOfClaim}
moneyBackdated.format: How much money you had on ${dateOfClaim} must be an amount of money like 7.50 or 8.00.
moneyBackdated.change: Change how much money you had on your claim start date

moneyToday.label: How much money do you have today?
moneyToday.required: Enter how much money you have today.
moneyToday.format: How much money you have today must be an amount of money like 7.50 or 8.00.
moneyToday.change: Change how much money you have today
